subject: Subject
tipTimetable: The current lesson is highlighted in a dim color. Below is the slider for selecting the day of the week.
timePackBag: it's time to collect your portfolio!
tipGrades1: On this page, you can view the ratings for the interval you selected. by default, the current month is taken.
tipGrades2: there is a button in the Right corner. after clicking on it, you can select the period for which you want to show your grades.
tipTasks1: On this page you can view and add homework for the day
tipTasks2:
there is a slider at the Bottom that you can move to select the day of the week.
The date selection button is also located next to the number.
tipTasks3:
After adding tasks, you will see cards that can be viewed by swiping to the right and left.
The double tap on the card allows you to mark the task as completed
tipTasks4: in the Right corner there is a filter that allows you to choose which data to show.
tipTasks5: There is also a button (arrows) for changing the task screen in the upper-right corner. Click to switch between all outstanding tasks and tasks for the current day.
errorTimeRange: Start time must be earlier than end time
